page.title: 09GOWY VALLEY EDUCATION
page.content: {EDUCATION}There are Primary schools at Guilden Sutton (180 pupils) and Great Barrow (30 pupils), both maintain a close relationship with parents who help in school with cookery, arts and craft, fund raising etc. The communities support the school as it is central to a living village. {RELIGION}There are Anglican churches at Great Barrow and Guilden Sutton both with incumbents. There is a Methodist Chapel in the latter served by circuit Preachers. There are active groups attached to all Churches including Sunday School and Prayer meetings. {LAW & ORDER}Because it is a rural area a community Policeman serves several villages. There is a cross section of crime but the levels are not considered high.
